name: Potato (KorinOo)
description:
Potato is a simple roguelike top-down shooter done in GameMaker. You are a pilot of a combat mech and your goal is to get as many points as possible. You get points by killing enemies and staying alive as long as you can. But watch out! The longer you are alive, the more enemies are spawned!

Killed enemies have chance to drop an item. If you are lucky, you can get an instant repair pack, new weapon or a weapon upgrade.

Just a quick prototype. Done for practice in GameMaker.
